author: Staff Reporter
text:
Second Additional District Judge M. Ravindran has sentenced two persons to undergo double life imprisonment for murdering a couple in 2006.

Kulandai Gounder of Mecheri was married to Kannayammal and was running a small hotel in the area.

On April 12, 2006, unidentified men attacked them with deadly weapons and took away Rs. 30,000 cash and 7.5 sovereign gold jewellery from her.

They also took away items from the house.

Both died on the spot.

Mecheri police registered a case and arrested Selvam (34), of Chinna Tirupathi, Annadurai (34) and three others who were minors.

Selvam and Annadurai were found guilty of the crime and the judge sentenced them to undergo double life imprisonment besides imposing a fine of Rs. 5,000 each.

Their sentences will run concurrently.

Later, they were lodged at prison.
title: Two get double life term for murder
